message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. After careful consideration of its value and potential benefits, I am offering it to you for $1500000. This generous offer is designed to ensure you have ample opportunity to assess its worth and consider a purchase. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this product has great potential, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Would you be willing to consider this price?
